name: PermitPortal
headline: AI Operating System for Pre-construction
description: We are building workflows to help developers go from finding and closing development sites to getting a building permit faster. PermitPortal accelerates the most critical parts of the pre-construction phase: finding the right sites, understanding entitlements and navigating local development sentiment.

founders.name: Radu Mazilu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of PermitPortal  |  Previously developed 700MW of clean energy projects in Europe  |  Founding Engineer of Fleek (W22)  |  UCL'19

founders.name: Alexandru Enache, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of PermitPortal | Previously developed 700MW of clean energy projects in Europe | Founding Engineer of Fleek (W22) | King's College London'19

raw_markdown="![PermitPortal Logo](https://permitportalapp.com/logo.png)
[Book demo](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/calendly.com/permitportal/30min>)
AI-Powered Pre-Construction Platform
# Get to Shovel Ready 50% Faster
From site selection to construction start, PermitPortal helps real estate developers navigate pre-construction with AI-powered insights, local intelligence, and automated workflows.
[Find Sites Now](https://permitportalapp.com/<#site-search>)[Research Cities](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/calendly.com/permitportal/30min>)
![PermitPortal Dashboard Preview](https://permitportalapp.com/landing.png)
![City Logo](https://permitportalapp.com/Tan.png)
## Test Drive Our AI Site Search
Experience how our AI can find your perfect development site. Just describe what you‘re looking for in plain English.
AI-powered search
Search Available Sites
Instant analysis of zoning, market data, and infrastructure
#### Intelligent Site Search
  * Understands natural search terms like walkable area and high foot traffic
  * Searches zoning, demographics, and market data in real-time
  * Ranks sites based on your specific needs
  * Shows key property details like zoning, utilities, and traffic


### Your Search Query
We‘ll analyze your search and send you a curated list of the top 10 sites that match your criteria.
  * Detailed zoning analysis and restrictions
  * Development potential and constraints
  * Property owner contact information


Send Me the Report
## Everything you needto get permits approved
### Natural Language Site Search
Describe the perfect site in plain English. Our AI analyzes hundreds of data sources to find properties matching your exact criteria.
Learn more
### Local Intelligence
Understand development sentiment, approval history, and key stakeholders. Get insights from regulations and past permits.
Learn more
### Automated Workflows
Send letters of interest with one click. Track project status, manage documents, and stay ahead of development risks.
Learn more
“PermitPortal simplified our entire permitting process. What used to take weeks now takes days. It's a game-changer for our projects.”
![Permit Search Interface](https://permitportalapp.com/permits.png)
## Find permit requirementsin plain English
Simply describe your construction project, and our AI will tell you exactly what permits you need and how to get them approved.
  * Ask natural language questions and get instant, accurate answers based on local regulations
  * Get step-by-step checklists, required forms, and detailed instructions
  * View real-time cost estimates and typical processing times
  * Identify potential issues early to avoid costly delays


## Deep local insightspowered by AI
Our AI analyzes regulations, permit history, and planning commission meetings to give you deep insights into any city's development landscape.
  * Identify key stakeholders and decision makers
  * Analyze planning commission sentiment
  * Review similar approved projects


![Local Intelligence Dashboard](https://permitportalapp.com/sentiment.png)
![Due Diligence Report Example](https://permitportalapp.com/report-section-example.jpeg)
## Due Diligence Reportsgenerated in seconds
Turn raw property data into actionable insights with our AI-powered due diligence reports.
  * Site analysis and recommendations
  * Zoning constraints and development potential
  * Competitive landscape and market opportunities
  * ROI projections and incentive programs


## Real-Time Project Status & Insights
Connect your virtual data room to track your development progress in real-time
### 123 Main Street Development
Mixed-use residential • 250 units • Downtown
On TrackPhase 2 of 4
#### Development Status
Site AcquisitionComplete
Permit ApplicationsIn Progress
Environmental ReviewPending
#### Next Steps
  * 1
Submit revised site plans
  * 2
Schedule community meeting
  * 3
Complete traffic study


#### Risk Assessment
Potential zoning variance needed
Community feedback pending
Budget within projections
## From Years to Months
Start accelerating your development timeline today with our AI-powered platform.
### Find Sites
Use natural language to search for properties matching your exact criteria.
### Research
Get AI-powered insights on local development sentiment and requirements.
### Acquire
Send letters of interest and track property acquisition progress.
### Develop
Navigate pre-construction with automated workflows and AI assistance.
## Start accelerating your development timeline
Join leading developers who are using PermitPortal to cut pre-construction timelines in half and make better site selection decisions.
[Schedule Demo](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/calendly.com/permitportal/30min>)[Contact Us](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/calendly.com/permitportal/30min>)
Try PermitPortal free for  one city and let us help you discover risks, requirements, and opportunities in your area.
[Try for free](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/calendly.com/permitportal/30min>)
![Logo](https://permitportalapp.com/inverted_logo.png)
The operating system for pre-construction, powered by AI.
[![Y Combinator](https://permitportalapp.com/YC_orange.png)F24](https://permitportalapp.com/<#>)
© 2023 PermitPortal, Inc.
### Product
  * [Features](https://permitportalapp.com/<#features>)
  * [Project Tracking](https://permitportalapp.com/<#case-studies>)
  * [Case Studies](https://permitportalapp.com/<#permit-requirements>)


### Company
  * [About](https://permitportalapp.com/<#>)
  * Careers


### Connect
  * [LinkedIn](https://permitportalapp.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/permitportal>)
  * Email

generated_description:
**PermitPortal: Revolutionizing Pre-Construction with AI**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch F24, PermitPortal is anchored in San Francisco, driven by a lean team of two. Their mission? To streamline and fast-track the often tedious pre-construction process for real estate developers. The company emerged from the recognition of the hurdles developers face—from scouting sites to securing building permits. 

### What They Do

PermitPortal offers an AI-powered operating system tailored for pre-construction workflows. They help users find development sites, understand entitlements, and gauge local sentiment—all critical aspects that can cause delays and complications in development projects. Their platform leverages AI to deliver insights, automate workflows, and harness local intelligence, which cuts the time to get “shovel ready” by a substantial 50%.

### Key Features

- **AI Site Search**: Users can search for properties with plain language, enabling the AI to analyze zoning, market data, and infrastructure to find suitable sites.
- **Automated Workflows**: Forget manual tracking. PermitPortal allows seamless tracking of project statuses and can even send letters of interest with a single click.
- **Local Intelligence**: Gain insights into community sentiment, approval histories, and the local regulatory landscape, providing developers with a clearer understanding of potential roadblocks.

### How It Works

The platform offers functionalities like:

- Describing the ideal site in plain English for accurate AI-driven search results.
- Generating detailed due diligence reports in seconds that turn complex property data into actionable insights.
- Providing real-time project tracking linked directly to data rooms for enhanced management oversight.

### The Vision

PermitPortal aims to transform how real estate developers navigate the intricate pre-construction landscape. Their approach not only makes finding sites easier but also ensures that developers are better equipped to handle local regulations and stakeholder sentiments, ultimately leading to faster approvals and less overhead time.

If you’re in the real estate or construction space and tired of the prolonged pre-construction timeline, PermitPortal could be your next best ally. Their straightforward, AI-driven tools promise to make the process faster, more efficient, and significantly less cumbersome.

To see PermitPortal in action or to start redefining your pre-construction experience, check out their website: [PermitPortal](https://permitportalapp.com/).
